description:
Company Description

Myers Capital is a privately owned mortgage banking company established in 1998 that provides residential and commercial mortgage loans throughout Hawaii and the mainland U.S. The company's lending services include Conventional, VA, FHA, USDA, bank statement, fix and flip, bridge and home equity loans. Myers Capital also helps business and real estate owners purchase, renovate, or creatively restructure their real estate debt, including office, retail, industrial, and multi-family real estate. The company provides expert mortgage planning to help clients achieve their specific real estate and financial goals.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Commercial Loan Originator. The Commercial Loan Originator will be responsible for creating and maintaining relationships with new and existing clients, analyzing financial information and creditworthiness of clients, underwriting and evaluating loans, and managing the loan origination process from application to closing.

This role primary will be originating loans from our in house private mortgage debt fund as well as through our relationships with DSCR wholesale lenders. The originator will be working with outside mortgage brokers, real estate investors, builders & developers, as well as commercial property owners to assist with bridge loans, ground up construction, and small balance commercial loans. Property types include 1-4, multifamily, land, and other commercial properties.

Qualifications
• Underwriting and Loan Origination skills
• Mortgage and Loan experience
• Finance knowledge and analytical skills
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Strong negotiation and problem-solving abilities
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Economics, or related field
• Experience in investment and commercial real estate lending is a plus
• NMLS license is generally not required (*certain loan types in some states do require NMLS licensing)
